concept.title: Pipeline and Stage Errors
concept.shortdesc: When you monitor a pipeline, you can view error statistics for the pipeline and each stage. You can also view a sampling of the error records.

conbody.p: The Rules tab in the Monitor panel displays pipeline errors by default:

To view error statistics for a stage, click the stage. The Rules tab of the Monitor panel displays a sample of error records with related error messages, as well as the count and a histogram of errors:
The number of error records saved in memory is defined in the properties file.
